shots.query: The TCM formula commonly used during the Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) epidemic of 2003 in China is the Sang-Ju-Yin formula adjusted by adding Radix Isatidis, Radix Scutellariae and Radix Astragali (Fratkin, 2010).
